actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to prevent congressional reapportionment distortions.
short_title: Fair and Accurate Representation Act of 2006

summary.text: Fair and Accurate Representation Act of 2006 - Amends federal census law to direct the Secretary of Commerce to adjust census figures as necessary so that illegal aliens are not counted for purposes of the apportionment of Representatives in the Congress.

titles.title: Fair and Accurate Representation Act of 2006
A bill to prevent congressional reapportionment distortions.
